meanings.definition: A drug used to treat HIV infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed nevirapine to help fight the virus.
meanings.sent2: She takes nevirapine every day to manage her HIV.
meanings.sent3: The nevirapine bottle danced on the shelf, eager to be taken.
meanings.sent4: Nevirapine is like a shield, protecting the body from HIV.
meanings.sent5: The red nevirapine pills were a symbol of hope for many patients.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication used to prevent mother-to-child transmission of HIV.
meanings.sent1: The hospital provided nevirapine to pregnant women to protect their babies.
meanings.sent2: Nevirapine has been successful in reducing HIV transmission from mother to child.
meanings.sent3: The nevirapine packet winked at the expecting mothers, promising safety.
meanings.sent4: Nevirapine acts as a barrier, stopping the virus from passing to the baby.
meanings.sent5: The importance of nevirapine in preventing HIV spread is widely recognized.
